com.tencent.soter.wrapper

类 SoterWrapperApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tencent.soter.wrapper.SoterWrapperApi
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    SoterErrCode, SoterProcessErrCode

    public class SoterWrapperApi
extends java.lang.Object
implements SoterProcessErrCode
    Created by henryye on 2017/4/13. The wrapped public interfaces exported to developer For applications not having special needs in SOTER, it will satisfy you if you only focus on these APIs.

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 com.tencent.soter.wrapper.wrap_core.SoterProcessErrCode

        ERR_ACCOUNT_SALT_LEN_TOO_LONG, ERR_ADD_TASK_FAILED, ERR_AUTH_KEY_NOT_IN_MAP, ERR_AUTHKEY_ALREADY_EXPIRED, ERR_AUTHKEY_NOT_FOUND, ERR_CONTEXT_INSTANCE_NOT_EXISTS, ERR_CUSTOM_ASK_NAME_TOO_LONG, ERR_FINGERPRINT_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED, ERR_FINGERPRINT_LOCKED, ERR_GET_CHALLENGE, ERR_GET_SUPPORT_SOTER_REMOTE_FAILED, ERR_INIT_SIGN_FAILED, ERR_NO_BUSINESS_SCENE_PROVIDED, ERR_NO_FINGERPRINT_ENROLLED, ERR_NO_NET_WRAPPER, ERR_NOT_INIT_WRAPPER, ERR_SIGN_FAILED, ERR_START_AUTHEN_FAILED, ERR_UNEXPECTED_PURPOSE, ERR_UPLOAD_ASK_FAILED, ERR_UPLOAD_AUTH_KEY_FAILED, ERR_UPLOAD_OR_VERIFY_SIGNATURE_FAILED, ERR_USER_CANCELLED

      • 从接口继承的字段 com.tencent.soter.core.model.SoterErrCode

        ERR_ASK_GEN_FAILED, ERR_ASK_NOT_EXIST, ERR_AUTH_KEY_GEN_FAILED, ERR_OK, ERR_PARAMERROR, ERR_REMOVE_ASK, ERR_REMOVE_AUTH_KEY, ERR_SOTER_NOT_SUPPORTED, ERR_UNKNOWN

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SoterWrapperApi

        public SoterWrapperApi()

    • 方法详细资料

      • init

        public static void init(android.content.Context context,
                        SoterProcessCallback<SoterProcessNoExtResult> callback,
                        @NonNull
                        InitializeParam param)
        It is required to call it before any SOTER related event. This will do the prepare work, including asking whether the device supports SOTER from server. Call it from Application.onCreate() if your application does not
        参数:
        context - The context.
        callback - The callback of the process.
        param - The parameter if the initialization operation

      • prepareAppSecureKey

        public static void prepareAppSecureKey(SoterProcessCallback<SoterProcessKeyPreparationResult> callback,
                                       boolean isAutoDeleteIfAlreadyExists,
                                       IWrapUploadKeyNet appSecureKeyNetWrapper)
        Prepare the App Secure Key. You can call it as soon as you checked the device supports SOTER. If you want to generate ASK when you want to use the Auth Key for the first time, you can call prepareAuthKey(SoterProcessCallback, boolean, boolean, int, IWrapUploadKeyNet, IWrapUploadKeyNet) and put your App Secure Key prepare network wrapper in the param.
        参数:
        callback - The callback of the process
        isAutoDeleteIfAlreadyExists - If the App Secure Key should be deleted when there's already one. You should not set it to true in most cases
        appSecureKeyNetWrapper - The network wrapper of uploading App Secure Key.

      • prepareAuthKey

        public static void prepareAuthKey(SoterProcessCallback<SoterProcessKeyPreparationResult> callback,
                                  boolean isAutoDeleteIfAlreadyExists,
                                  boolean isAutoPrepareASKWhenNotFound,
                                  int scene,
                                  IWrapUploadKeyNet authKeyNetWrapper,
                                  IWrapUploadKeyNet appSecureKeyNetWrapper)
        Prepare Auth Key of a specific business scene. Note that you can either prepared App Secure Key before, or you can set isAutoDeleteIfAlreadyExists to true and set your App Secure Key network wrapper to appSecureKeyNetWrapper, we will help you to generate the App Secure Key.
        参数:
        callback - The callback of the result
        isAutoDeleteIfAlreadyExists - If the Auth Key should be auto deleted if there's already one.
        isAutoPrepareASKWhenNotFound - If we should auto prepare the App Secure Key if it is not found in the device
        scene - Business scene. Should be initialized in init(Context, SoterProcessCallback, InitializeParam)
        authKeyNetWrapper - The network wrapper to upload Auth Key.
        appSecureKeyNetWrapper - The network wrapper to upload App Secure Key is isAutoPrepareASKWhenNotFound is true

      • requestAuthorizeAndSign

        public static void requestAuthorizeAndSign(SoterProcessCallback<SoterProcessAuthenticationResult> callback,
                                           @NonNull
                                           AuthenticationParam param)
        Wrap the whole authentication process, including request fingerprint authentication, generate the signature and upload the signature to the server.
        参数:
        param - The parameter of the authentication process.

      • isSupportSoter

        public static boolean isSupportSoter()
        Check whether the device supports SOTER. The only difference between SoterCore.isNativeSupportSoter() and this method is that it also judge the result combining with server check result.
        返回:
        True if the device supports SOTER, false otherwise

      • isInitialized

        public static boolean isInitialized()
        Check whether SOTER is initialized.
        返回:
        true if already initialized

      • removeAuthKeyByScene

        public static boolean removeAuthKeyByScene(int scene)
        Remove the Auth Key using business scene code.
        参数:
        scene - Business scene. Should be initialized in init(Context, SoterProcessCallback, InitializeParam)
        返回:
        True if the remove process is successful, false otherwise

      • tryStopAllSoterTask

        public static void tryStopAllSoterTask()
        Try to stop all SOTER processes which have not finished. Note that the keys would be deleted if the key generating process is forced to stop.

      • release

        public static void release()
        Release SOTER initialize state. You should call it when you want to clear the initialize status manually, such as switch the account. Note that it will call tryStopAllSoterTask().
